localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Stop wasting time to recreate the same things to manage your projects every time. With Notion PM you have everything already done: document binder, contacts, stages, roadmap, tasks, and page templates. One-click. 3 different styles with more than 200 assets.
blogPost.body: Stop wasting time to recreate the same things to manage your projects every time. With Notion PM you have everything already done: document binder, contacts, stages, roadmap, tasks, and page templates. One-click. 3 different styles with more than 200 assets.
blogPost.title: Notion PM - The perfect workspace to manage projects with your clients
blogPost.author: Vincenzo Di Cosmo

localize.description: 不要再浪费时间去重新创建同样的东西来管理你的项目。有了Notion PM，你已经拥有了一切：文件夹、联系人、阶段、路线图、任务和页面模板。一键式。3种不同的风格，200多种资产。
localize.tagline: 与客户一起管理项目的完美工作空间。

localize.description: 不要再浪費時間去重新創建同樣的東西來管理你的項目。有了Notion PM，你已經擁有了一切：文件夾、聯繫人、階段、路線圖、任務和頁面模板。一鍵式。3種不同的風格，200多種資產。
localize.tagline: 與客戶一起管理項目的完美工作空間。

previous.excerpt: This tool help you generate quotes easily and quickly. Click on "Generate Quotes" button, it will show different quote. If you click on the "Generate Design" button it will generate different look and feel but with the same quotes.
previous.title: Quote Generator - Quote generator with automatic design capability

localize.description: 本工具可以帮助你轻松快速地生成报价。点击 "生成报价 "按钮，将显示不同的报价。如果你点击 "生成设计 "按钮，它将生成不同的外观和感觉，但相同的报价。
localize.tagline: 具有自动设计能力的报价生成器

localize.description: 本工具可以幫助你輕鬆快速地生成報價。點擊 "生成報價 "按鈕，將顯示不同的報價。如果你點擊 "生成設計 "按鈕，它將生成不同的外觀和感覺，但相同的報價。
localize.tagline: 具有自動設計能力的報價生成器

next.excerpt: Custom Reactions - make your day-to-day communication more fun with custom-made emojis & reactions for your Slack/Discord! Immortalize all the inside jokes, brilliant puns, funny moments - all for a price of frappucino!
next.title: Custom Reactions - Custom Slack & Discord emoji reactions for the whole team

localize.description: 自定义表情 - 为您的 Slack/Discord 定制表情和反应，让您的日常沟通更有趣 将所有的内部笑话、精彩的双关语、有趣的时刻永垂不朽--所有这些都只需花上一杯咖啡的价钱!
localize.tagline: 为整个团队定制Slack和Discord表情符号反应。

localize.description: 自定義表情 - 爲您的 Slack/Discord 定製表情和反應，讓您的日常溝通更有趣 將所有的內部笑話、精彩的雙關語、有趣的時刻永垂不朽--所有這些都只需花上一杯咖啡的價錢!
localize.tagline: 爲整個團隊定製Slack和Discord表情符號反應。
